location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Pelly regarding a journal of his travels through Afghanistan that may be of interest to the Viceroy of India

mods.abstract: The letter summarizes the journal kept by Pelly when travelling through Afghanistan on government duty in 1860, stating that it is based on personal observations and also includes letters Pelly wrote to Lord Canning (Charles John Canning) which may be of interest or relevance.
